attributes.action: End the inequality and offer fathers the same paternity leave as mothers.
attributes.additional_details:
To deny fathers the same benefit is unfair, unequal and sexist, the father should be available to help the mother of a new born child, a very difficult time for many families. For up to 39 weeks with pay as women are. 
Many women who have C sections or difficult births require extra care, especially if they already have an older child. 
2 weeks leave is not suitable or long enough to allow a father to bond with a new baby and to aid the recovery of his partner after child birth/C section.
attributes.background:
Women in the UK are entitled to paid maternity leave up to 39 weeks. 

Men only get 2 weeks.
